name: Agent Orange Design
tagline: Changing the world one brand at a time!
description:
Agent Orange Design is a multi-disciplinary Creative Agency founded in 1997, in Johannesburg, South Africa. Using our 17+ years of wisdom and experience, we approach every project with a fierce desire to create something unique and inspiring that transforms each client's business.
We specialise in: Logo Design and Brand Identity, Website Design and Development, Graphic Design for Print, Video and Motion Graphics and Photography Services. Basically, whatever our clients need done, we’re able to facilitate. We pride ourselves in being versatile and creating solutions around our client’s individual needs.
If you are looking for a creative partner that will care about your business as much as you do, get in touch!
